reviewText: Since I love Celtic music, I am attempting to learn the Bodhran. I found this tape to be next to useless.  It is a good introduction, but has little useful information.  If you are an absolute beginner like me, you will find Tommy Hayes "Bodhran Bones and Spoons", as well as  Mel Mercier "Bodhran & Bones" very helpful.  They are both excellent, but I might give Mel Mercier an extra point for being a little more technical.
